quotes.quote: A true champion can adapt to anything.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: You've got to have a villain and they'll always make me a villain.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: You hear certain things, negative things, all the time that aren't true, but you never hear about the positive.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: I’m a man of my word.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: There comes a time when money doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: Self-preservation is an important thing to me.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: All the money I have, I got it legally.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: People have said things about me, and wrote and criticized me about things in the past, but it goes in one ear and out the other.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: I'm always going to love my father.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: When it’s all said and done, only God can judge me.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The more perfect a person is on the outside, the more demons they have on the inside.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: People do not really want freedom, because freedom involves responsibility and most people are frightened of responsibility.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Thought is action in rehearsal.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The only person with whom you have to compare yourself is you in the past.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Love and work...work and love, that's all there is.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: One is very crazy when in love.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The madman is a dreamer awake.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: If you think big, big things will happen
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: Time with cats is never wasted
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: In the small matters, trust the mind. In the large ones, trust the heart.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: A woman should soften but not weaken a man.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: If you can't do it, give up!
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Showing is better than telling.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: I want to separate the ordinary from the extraordinary.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: Tough times don't last, tough people do.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: A free mind makes his own choices. An enslaved mind follows the crowd.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather

quotes.quote: To be the best, you have to work overtime.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather
